entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Aupaluk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:24 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -33.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Aupaluk Airport 2:00 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
Temperature: -33.4°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -46
Dewpoint: -38.0°C
Wind: WSW 16 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 32.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny this morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 32. Wind chill near minus 49. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Clear. Local blowing snow. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 36. Wind chill near minus 53. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 30.
